name: In Control
description:
"July 11th, 2065, Day 1: Today is the first day of your deployment. You are the overseer, an AI in control of keeping our streets safe from crime. Your instructions are as follows: use the Crime Predicting Monitoring (CPM) service to observe public activity and use the manual to determine crimes, and their severity. Your responses will send our robot units in to complete whatever you order them. If you fail to follow the manual, your program will be shutdown. Do not disappoint."

This game was created by @Simorico for GMTK 's Game Jam 2020.  The theme for this year was "Out of Control". If you want to follow him, you can find him on Twitter and Tumblr.
